sentences.en: Business is made up of ambiguous victories and nebulous defeats. Claim them all as victories.
sentences.cn: 商场上充满著不清楚的胜利和不明显的失败──把它们全都宣称为胜利.

sentences.en: Creativity is often made be a nebulous , messy, complicated, difficult thing and it can be.
sentences.cn: 创造力常常假装成朦胧的, 复杂的, 艰难的甚至乱七八糟的东西.它可以是这样.

sentences.en: Fragile , different, surprising, it is nebulous material, a place halfway between nature and artifice.
sentences.cn: 脆弱的, 新奇的, 令人惊讶的, 运用含糊不清的材料, 交织着自然与技巧的场所.

sentences.en: Ideas of fairness in taxation are usually nebulous.
sentences.cn: 公平这一概念在税收领域一向是模糊不清的.

sentences.en: It is marked by a tendency to employ shapes of a deliberately nebulous character.
sentences.cn: 它以故意模糊不清的朦胧形象为标志.

sentences.en: It's not comfortable with nebulous concepts such as love, need and trust.
sentences.cn: 它不适应思考像爱 、 需要、信任之类朦胧的概念.

sentences.en: Music is such a nebulous thing.
Romance is a nebulous thing with the curious property of being describable but not definable.
sentences.cn: 浪漫是可描述但却不容易被定义的一种带有新奇特性的朦胧事物.

sentences.en: So - called truth is a nebulous thing at best.
sentences.cn: 所谓 真理是极其模糊,难于分辩的东西.

sentences.en: The company only had a nebulous idea of the next model of car they would manufacture.
sentences.cn: 该公司对他们下次要制造的车型只有模糊的概念.

sentences.en: The evening films began to make nebulous pictures of the valleys.
sentences.cn: 那时苍茫的暮色,已经开始把那些山谷染成一片烟霭凄迷的图画了.

sentences.en: The notions we children were able to form of the great world beyond were exceedingly nebulous.
sentences.cn: 我们这些孩子所能形成的对外部世界的认识是非常模糊的。

sentences.en: The other more nebulous considerations must , for this time, be left to the philosophers and theologians.
sentences.cn: 另一些情况不明 、 有待思考的问题暂且留待哲学家和神学去解决.

sentences.en: These nebulous conceptions of economic justice come down to us from medieval times.
sentences.cn: 这些有关经济正义的含混概念是从中世纪流传下来的.

words.tran_cn: 朦胧的；星云的，星云状的

trans.tran_cn: 云雾状的，星云的，朦胧的，模糊的
trans.tran_en: an idea that is nebulous is not at all clear or exact
